name: Cookie Accept – GDPR & CCPA Cookie Consent
author: Rakhmad

sections.description:
Simple and elegant cookie consent is all you need. Cookie Accept is a simple cookie consent, concern and compliance. Get your site ready for GDPR, CCPA or the others. Control your cookie consent via options with live preview.

Easy to Customize!

Here some key features you will get:

  • Live Preview. See your cookie consent while editing it.
  • Dark Mode Ready. Match your site color mode.
  • Custom Cookie Consent Message Yes, you can customize the message.
  • Clean CSS and Javascript Frontend. If your visitor look at your site source code, they possibly don’t realize you use this plugin.
  • Single Line Database. Yep! this plugin save all your custom settings of this plugin into only one row of data inside wp_options table.
  • Responsive. Well it is a must for website nowadays.
sections.changelog:
2.2.0

  • Bug fixed on backend preview.

2.1.0

  • Now consent icon supported. Bug fixed. More accesibility on admin. New tab arrange.

2.0.0

  • Now customizable. with Live preview. Multisite supported.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
